message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game early!
I'm not greedy, let's split it down the middle. Your turn to decide!
I'll think about it, Bob. I'll make a counteroffer in Round 3.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This is a fair split considering the inflation.
I'm willing to take a slightly larger share, but I think I deserve more than 40% of the remaining value!
I'm not convinced, Bob. I'll make a counteroffer in Round 4.
I'm not backing down, Bob. This is my best offer so far. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up. This is my last reasonable offer, I think I deserve more than 30% of the remaining value!
I'm not convinced, Bob. I'll make a counteroffer in Round 6.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm taking a risk, but I think I can get a better deal if I push for more. This is my last chance to get a significant share!
Alright, Bob. I'll take it. It's not ideal, but I don't want to risk getting nothing.
